BackstoryDef.title: cult child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a large cult. What time that was not spent keeping the faith was spent in betterment of one of the cult's many self-sufficient compounds.

BackstoryDef.title: cult child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a large cult. What time that was not spent keeping the faith was spent training to combat the faithless.

BackstoryDef.title: cult child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a large cult. What time that was not spent keeping the faith was spent training to convert the faithless.

BackstoryDef.title: cult child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a large cult. What time that was not spent keeping the faith was spent creating works to glorify the true faith.

BackstoryDef.title: cult child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a large cult. What time that was not spent keeping the faith was spent cultivating the holy incenses that would reveal the truth to the faithless.

BackstoryDef.title: cult child
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a large cult, working long hours extracting raw resources from the earth to build monuments for the true faith. However, a chance unsecured logistics terminal gave [PAWN_nameDef] a glimpse into the outside world. [PAWN_possessive] eyes opened, [PAWN_pronoun] escaped the first opportunity [PAWN_pronoun] got.

BackstoryDef.title: vatborn cultist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was artficially grown to be an initiate of a large cult. This was a not uncommon practice on many worlds where cults needed to secretly expand their size.

BackstoryDef.title: vatborn cultist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was artficially grown to be an initiate of a large cult. However, a love of literature and learning allowed doubt to enter [PAWN_possessive] mind and shake the indoctrination. [PAWN_possessive] eyes opened, [PAWN_pronoun] escaped the first chance [PAWN_pronoun] got.

BackstoryDef.title: cult enforcer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as part of the enforcement arm of a large cult, maintaining dicipline and "motivating" members to keep the faith. [PAWN_possessive] higher-ups, for their part, found [PAWN_objective] the perfect follower, loyal and always willing to follow orders.

BackstoryDef.title: cult enforcer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as part of the enforcement arm of a large cult, maintaining dicipline and "motivating" members to keep the faith. This suited [PAWN_objective] well, as the screams of the faithful were as birdsong to their master.

BackstoryDef.title: cult enforcer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as part of the enforcement arm of a large cult, protecting the faithful from prying eyes of the law and facilitating unfortunate accidents for prying academics and dogged journalists who refused to stop asking questions.

BackstoryDef.title: cult enforcer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as part of the enforcement arm of a large cult. After [PAWN_pronoun] failed to complete a mission, [PAWN_possessive] superiors made an example of [PAWN_objective] to inspire the other faithful. [PAWN_possessive] mind never truly recovered.

BackstoryDef.title: cult troubleshooter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as part of the enforcement arm of a large cult, discretely removing threats and opponents of the true faith.

BackstoryDef.title: cult troubleshooter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] served as part of the enforcement arm of a large cult. [PAWN_nameDef] was called upon when threats to the true faith had grown to a level where discretion was no longer a factor.

BackstoryDef.title: cult scholar
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] initially came into contact with a large cult to study their belief system. It wasn't long before [PAWN_pronoun] was enlightened to the true faith.

BackstoryDef.title: cult scholar
BackstoryDef.description: A scholar of ancient folklore, [PAWN_nameDef] discovered the texts buried deep in the university archives described a belief system remarkably similar to that which the new ideoligion [PAWN_pronoun] had seen was preaching. [PAWN_nameDef] quickly focused [PAWN_possessive] studies on this similarity, but abandoned such frivolities upon being enlightened to the true faith.

BackstoryDef.title: cult scholar
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] discovered a number of ancient tomes in a hidden chamber of [PAWN_possessive] father's estate. Through years of study, [PAWN_pronoun] learned [PAWN_possessive] house had turned its back on the old ways. After a series of unfortunate accidents left [PAWN_nameDef] in control of [PAWN_possessive] house, the cult found a powerful ally already enlightened to the true faith.

BackstoryDef.title: cult ritualist
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was already enlightened to the true faith. [PAWN_pronoun] studied ancient rituals, pouring over the subtle variations listed archaic tomes, looking to reduce the cost various rites had on human resources.

BackstoryDef.title: cult initiate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lower level initiate in a large cult, a position which was no small source of insecurity. To prove [PAWN_possessive] loyality and worth to the true faith, [PAWN_nameDef] volunteered for many dangerous missions [PAWN_pronoun] was less than qualified for.

BackstoryDef.title: cult initiate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lower level initiate in a large cult and totally loyal to the true faith. After all, [PAWN_possessive] masters provided for all [PAWN_pronoun] would ask for. Importantly, [PAWN_pronoun] knew what [PAWN_pronoun] was allowed to ask for.

BackstoryDef.title: cult initiate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lower level initiate in a large cult and less than totally loyal to the true faith. When [PAWN_pronoun] had joined, the promises had been so sweet, but [PAWN_pronoun] quickly soured after seeing a disasterous ritual. Still, [PAWN_pronoun] knew what happened to those who showed less than absolute devotion.

BackstoryDef.title: cult initiate
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was a lower level initiate in a large cult and finally totally loyal to the true faith. Yes, [PAWN_pronoun] had wavered in the past, but [PAWN_pronoun] had since been appropriately "diciplined."

BackstoryDef.title: cult prosyltizer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] recruited many believers into the true faith. Many were initially attracted by promises of power, euphoria, or pleasure, but once [PAWN_nameDef] had [PAWN_possessive] hooks in [PAWN_possessive] target, it wasn't long before they were truly enlightened.

BackstoryDef.title: seeker of the king
BackstoryDef.description:
A high ranking member of a cult, [PAWN_nameDef] sought to find [PAWN_possessive] king. Worse, [PAWN_pronoun] knew where to find him:

Along the shores the cloud waves break,
the twin suns sink behind the lake, 
the shadows lengthen
in Carcosa.
